title: Super V
overview: It's a story , mixed with Famous Indian cricket team captain Virat Kohli's childhood experiences, learnings and fiction. Virat is a teenage boy who's family has been playing role of a superhero , the last super hero was his grandpa . His father is a lawyer and doesn't want Virat to get mixed up with all this things. Meanwhile Virat's grandpa appears in his dream to guide him to become next superhero.With his best friends , he tries to find out truth behind secrets .Also the truth of shady Mr. Navab is yet to be found.
